title: I recently visit Fantagio’s audition page, they told for own music and K-pop for vocalists. What is the meaning of own music? - Quora

response.answer_text: It means if you are auditioning for vocalist position you should either sing a kpop song or your self produced song, your own lyrics and it should be original. So own song means song which is written, made and produced by you. Thank you~
It means have you written a self music Self music means the music that you written not any kpop music
